img.alt: Alta Loma School District to Close Campuses for Rest of School Year

a.span: Alta Loma School District to Close Campuses for Rest of School Year

div.p: The Alta Loma School District, in alignment with San Bernardino County Superintendent of Schools Ted Alejandre and State Superintendent of Public Instruction Tony Thurmond, and for the safety of all concerned because of the coronavirus outbreak, will close school campuses for the remainder of the school year.

a.title: Go to comments for Alta Loma School District to Close Campuses for Rest of School Year

img.alt: Statement from County Superintendent Alejandre Regarding Extending School Closures Due To COVID-19 Response

a.span: Statement from County Superintendent Alejandre Regarding Extending School Closures Due To COVID-19 Response

div.p: California Gov. Gavin Newsom and State Superintendent Tony Thurmond have called for California school campuses to remain closed for the remainder of the school year with the expectation that students education will continue through distance learning.

a.title: Go to comments for Statement from County Superintendent Alejandre Regarding Extending School Closures Due To COVID-19 Response
Go to comments for Health Office Update - Coronavirus

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.p: Located in the foothill community of Rancho Cucamonga, California, the Alta Loma School District serves over 6,000 achieving students with 300 teachers and administrative staff and an additional 450+ support staff.

The District prides itself on its educational program, which provides each student with the opportunity for maximum intellectual, social, and physical development. Strong parent and community involvement in the schools' academic excellence of our students, professional development of staff, and the stability of leadership all provide the foundation of success forInspiring Learners for a Lifetime!

div.p: By submitting this form, you are granting: Alta Loma School District, 9390 Base Line Road, Alta Loma, California, 91701, United States, permission to email you. You may unsubscribe via the link found at the bottom of every email. (See our Email Privacy Policy for details.) Emails are serviced by Constant Contact.
